ARABIC: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّهْتَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No, in fact they say, 'We found our fathers following a religion and we are simply guided in their footsteps.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In fact they say: "We found our fathers following a certain way, and are guided by their footprints."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay; they simply claim: “We found our forefathers on a way, and we continue to find guidance in their footsteps.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, they say, "We found our fathers following a certain belief and we now follow in their footsteps for our guidance".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Rather they said, “We found our forefathers upon a religion, and we are following their footsteps.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! They say: "We found our fathers following a certain way and religion, and we guide ourselves by their footsteps."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! they say: We found our fathers on a course, and surely we are guided by their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but they say, 'We found our fathers upon a community, and we are guided upon their traces.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, for they say only: Lo! we found our fathers following a religion, and we are guided by their footprints.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No indeed! They say, "We have found our fathers following a certain course, and we are guided by their footsteps."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nay! they say: verily we have found our fathers on a certain way, and verily by their footsteps we are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No, they said, ‘We found our fathers following a creed, and we are indeed guided in their footsteps.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay! they say: "We found our fathers following a certain religion, and we do guide ourselves by their footsteps."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! They say: "We found our fathers following a certain way and religion, and we guide ourselves by their footsteps."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, but they say: 'We found our fathers following a creed, and by following in their footsteps we are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they say, “We found our parents on a course, and we are guided in their footsteps.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:22] Nay, but they say, ‘Lo! we found our fathers following a [certain] creed and we are indeed, proceeding, in their footsteps to be guided’, by them, for they used to worship other than God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: They said: "We do not have, Muhammad, any other Scripture; but we found our fathers on this belief". Allah said: (Nay, for they say only: Lo! we found our fathers following a religion, and we are guided by their footprints) and we are following their religion and actions.
